message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $8000. Considering the value it can bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $10000 for this exclusive opportunity. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure you get the most out of your investment. Would you like to discuss this further or consider this proposal?
